DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether breathe pattern ( specifically inspiratory time/total respiratory cycle value ) influence response noninvasive mechanical ventilation .
DOC.brief_title: Response NonInvasive Mechanical Ventilation According Breathing Pattern
DOC.detailed_description: Breathing pattern analyze along adaptation 3 different NonInvasive-Mechanical-Ventilation mode ( control mode , spontaneous mode placebo mode simulator ) .
DOC.criteria: Hypercapnic chronic respiratory failure due restrictive pulmonary disease ( usual criterion home NonInvasive Mechanical Ventilation ) . Transcutaneous carbon dioxide ( CO2 ) basal pressure â‰¥ 50 mmHg conscious . Clinically stable ( within previous month ) . Patients without previous NonInvasive Mechanical Ventilation treatment . Clinical exacerbation . Chronic airflow limitation Forced expiratory volume 1 second/Forced vital capacity ( FEV1/FVC ) ratio < 70 % Sleep ApneaHypopnea Syndrome
